roleset.name: introduce an acetyl group into a compound

example.name: acetylate-v: patient and product of the reaction
example.text: The new NH2-terminal glycine is acetylated from acetyl-CoA when the polypeptide is 44 residues long.

example.name: acetylate-v: agent and instrument
example.text: We acetylated recombinant OGG1 with p300 (HAT domain) and confirmed acetylation by Western analysis with AcOGG1 antibody (Fig. 6A, lane 2).

example.name: acetylation-n
example.text: Acetylation of histones alters accessibility of chromatin

roleset.note: ACETYLATE-V NOTES: Created for Bio-AMR annotations.
